td.content: s:a 77 yr old white female retired presents with 3 years history of Body Aches. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 47.8 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient presents with 4 weeks history of worsening Body Aches. she is a 77 year old F retired. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 173 cm, Weight 47.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Penicillin G - 20,000,000 units divided in 6 doses daily, and ordered arthroscopic synovectomy - knee.

s:pt complains of Body Aches for 4 weeks. NKDA. she is a f aged 78 Ys. ocas ETOH on w/e Patient does not smoke o:Height 173 cm, Weight 47.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 99, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, B burgdor Ab, CSF ELISA 1.21 LIV(+) a:Lyme Disease p:administered Penicillin G - 20,000,000 units divided in 6 doses daily, performed B burgdor Ab, CSF ELISA, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
